name: stahlregen + shifter - hypnotron v 0-75
milkdrop_raw:

[preset00]

wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_per_frame1=// Custom wave code by shifter!
wave_0_per_frame2=
wave_0_per_frame3=q1 = 1;
wave_0_per_point1=// Custom wave code by shifter!
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=it = (it + 1)*above(sample,0)*below(it,53);
wave_0_per_point5=ita = (ita + equal(it,0))*above(sample,0);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=sw = 1-equal(it,0)*equal(ita,0);
wave_0_per_point8=swi = (equal(lr,9) + equal(lr,5))*equal(it,0)*equal(ita,4);
wave_0_per_point9=xv = if(sw - swi,xv,rand(1001)*.001*.8);
wave_0_per_point10=mx = xv + ita*.025;
wave_0_per_point11=my = if(sw - swi,my,rand(1001)*.001*.975);
wave_0_per_point12=
wave_0_per_point13=sz = .01;
wave_0_per_point14=vx = above(it,1)*below(it,39) + above(it,12)*below(it,28) - equal(it,20) + equal(it,46) + equal(it,51) + equal(it,41) - equal(it,15) - equal(it,25) + equal(it,10) + equal(it,30) - equal(it,4) - equal(it,36);
wave_0_per_point15=vy = above(it,17)*below(it,49) + above(it,22)*below(it,44) - equal(it,33) + equal(it,7) + equal(it,51) + equal(it,15) - equal(it,41) - equal(it,25) + equal(it,4) + equal(it,10) - equal(it,36) - equal(it,30);
wave_0_per_point16=
wave_0_per_point17=se = equal(ita,0)*3 + equal(ita,1)*8 + equal(ita,2)*1 + equal(ita,3)*15 + equal(ita,4)*19;
wave_0_per_point18=sf = equal(ita,0)*16 + equal(ita,1)*12 + equal(ita,2)*1 + equal(ita,3)*25;
wave_0_per_point19=sc = equal(ita,0)*13 + equal(ita,1)*1 + equal(ita,2)*7 + equal(ita,3)*9 + equal(ita,4)*3;
wave_0_per_point20=sd = equal(ita,0)*18 + equal(ita,1)*5 + equal(ita,2)*13 + equal(ita,3)*9 + equal(ita,4)*24;
wave_0_per_point21=sb = equal(ita,0)*19 + equal(ita,1)*8 + equal(ita,2)*1 + equal(ita,3)*4 + equal(ita,4)*5;
wave_0_per_point22=sa = equal(ita,0)*19 + equal(ita,1)*16 + equal(ita,2)*9 + equal(ita,3)*18 + equal(ita,4)*9 + equal(ita,5)*20;
wave_0_per_point23=sg = equal(ita,0)*5 + equal(ita,1)*20 + equal(ita,2)*8 + equal(ita,3)*5 + equal(ita,4)*18 + equal(ita,5)*5
wave_0_per_point24=   + equal(ita,6)*1 + equal(ita,7)*12;
wave_0_per_point25=sh = equal(ita,0)*13 + equal(ita,1)*9 + equal(ita,2)*14 + equal(ita,3)*4 + equal(ita,4)*6 + equal(ita,5)*21
wave_0_per_point26=   + equal(ita,6)*3 + equal(ita,7)*11;
wave_0_per_point27=sa = equal(ita,0)*6 + equal(ita,1)*14 + equal(ita,2)*15 + equal(ita,3)*18 + equal(ita,4)*4;
wave_0_per_point28=
wave_0_per_point29=lr = if(sw,lr,rand(10));
wave_0_per_point30=let = equal(lr,0)*sa + equal(lr,1)*sb + equal(lr,2)*sc + equal(lr,3)*sd + equal(lr,4)*se + equal(lr,5)*sf + equal(lr,6)*sg + equal(lr,7)*sh + equal(lr,8)*si + equal(lr,9)*sj;
wave_0_per_point31=
wave_0_per_point32=va = equal(let,23) + equal(let,24) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point33=vb = above(let,0)*below(let,9) + above(let,10)*below(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,23);
wave_0_per_point34=vc = equal(let,1) + equal(let,2) + equal(let,5) + equal(let,6) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,11) + equal(let,16) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,19);
wave_0_per_point35=vd = above(let,1)*below(let,9) + above(let,10)*below(let,24) - equal(let,20);
wave_0_per_point36=ve = equal(let,13) + equal(let,14) + equal(let,24) + equal(let,25);
wave_0_per_point37=vf = above(let,1)*below(let,8) + equal(let,9) + above(let,14)*below(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point38=vg = equal(let,1);
wave_0_per_point39=vh = equal(let,9) + equal(let,20);
wave_0_per_point40=vi = above(let,0)*below(let,5) - equal(let,3) + equal(let,18);
wave_0_per_point41=vj = above(let,2)*below(let,8) - equal(let,4) + equal(let,9) + above(let,14)*below(let,21) - equal(let,18) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point42=vk = equal(let,11) + equal(let,13) + above(let,23)*below(let,27);
wave_0_per_point43=vl = equal(let,8) + equal(let,10) + above(let,12)*below(let,18) + above(let,20)*below(let,24);
wave_0_per_point44=vm = equal(let,1) + equal(let,2) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,16) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,19);
wave_0_per_point45=vn = equal(let,1) + equal(let,7) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,10) + above(let,12)*below(let,24) - equal(let,16) - equal(let,18) - equal(let,20) - equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point46=vo = equal(let,11) + equal(let,14) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,23) + equal(let,24);
wave_0_per_point47=vp = equal(let,3) + equal(let,5) + equal(let,7) + equal(let,9) + equal(let,10) + equal(let,12) + equal(let,15) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point48=vq = equal(let,2) + equal(let,4) + equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point49=vr = equal(let,9) + equal(let,20) + equal(let,25);
wave_0_per_point50=vs = equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point51=vt = above(let,1)*below(let,13) - equal(let,6) - equal(let,8) - equal(let,11) + equal(let,15) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point52=
wave_0_per_point53=a = if(above(it,51),0,if(above(it,49),va,if(above(it,47),vb,if(above(it,44),vc,if(above(it,42),vd,if(above(it,39),ve, if(above(it,37),vf,if(above(it,34),vg,if(above(it,31),vh,if(above(it,28),vi,if(above(it,26),vj,if(above(it,23),vk, if(above(it,21),vl,if(above(it,18),vm,if(above(it,16),vn,if(above(it,13),vo,if(above(it,11),vp,if(above(it,8),vq, if(above(it,5),vr,if(above(it,2),vs,if(it,vt,0)))))))))))))))))))));
wave_0_per_point54=
wave_0_per_point55=a = a*below(ita,8)*q1;
wave_0_per_point56=
wave_0_per_point57=x = mx + vx*sz*.75;
wave_0_per_point58=y = my + vy*sz*1.5;

per_frame_1=warp = .125;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=vol = (bass_att+treb_att+mid_att)*.125;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=volt = volt + .1*vol;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=q1 = time+volt;
per_frame_8=q2 = aspectx;
per_frame_9=q3 = aspecty;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret.xy = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xy;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`//float better_ang = atan2((uv.y - 0.5), (uv.x - 0.5));
warp_7=`float better_rad = length((uv - 0.5)*_qa.zy);
warp_8=`//float3 hue_plus = hue_shader*8-7.25;
warp_9=`ret.z = lerp(1,-.5,frac(better_rad*10+_qa.x+1.114*ang))*3*rad-.1;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    
warp_12=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_13=`ret.y = (ret.y*.98)-0.004;
warp_14=`ret.z *= 1;
warp_15=`ret.x *= .7;
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret = lerp(0,1.5,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_5=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(.5,.5,.5),GetPixel(uv).x);
comp_6=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(2,0,0),GetPixel(uv).y);
comp_7=` ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_8=`}
